summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FocusFlow AI task prioritization app. All core features working perfectly including AI prioritization, Pomodoro timer, task management, and settings.
passed_tests: Backend API health check and AI enablement
Task CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
AI prioritization using GPT-5.2 with detailed reasoning
Statistics endpoints (completed tasks, focus time, pomodoros)
Frontend task creation dialog with all form fields
AI Prioritize button triggering intelligent task ordering
Session type switching (Focus, Short Break, Long Break)
Task completion and deletion from UI
Settings dialog with pomodoro duration configuration
